data.text: @CyWassom @lisarileyroche @Deseret Masking isn’t considered child abuse. What a far stretch to make. Telling people that they shouldn’t be able to make medical choices for their kids, or following CDC guidelines should be considered abuse is just a way to say you want state overeach authoritarian rules.

@lisarileyroche @Deseret The state epidemiologist is a menace to society. 

A vaccine that showed less than 12% efficacy,

And a near zero mortality for children,

And she recommends this?

Terminate her from her job immediately. https://t.co/dVrN4kIN9I

@lisarileyroche @Deseret Parents shouldn’t be giving these vaccines to kids in the first place. It should be considered child abuse just like masking. Kids are the least vulnerable and natural immunity is safer and more effective.
